#include <iostream>

#include<list>

#include<string>

#include<algorithm>



using namespace std;



int main(int argc, char** argv) {

    int n;

    char tmp[102];

    list<string> name;



    cin>>n;

	string str;

    while(n--){

        cin >> str;

        name.push_back(str);

    }

    name.sort();



    int ans=0;

    int i;

    for(list<string>::iterator it1=name.begin(), it2; it1!=name.end(); it1++){

        it2=it1;

        it2++;

        if(it2==name.end())

            break;

        int i;

        for(i=0;i<it1->length() && i<it2->length(); i++)

            if(it1->at(i)!=it2->at(i))

                break;

        ans = max(ans,i);

    }

    cout<<ans<<endl;



    return 0;

}
